question: 男優
sourceMnemonic:
A <kanji>man</kanji> who is <kanji>superior</kanji> to us is an <vocabulary>actor</vocabulary>, or more specifically a <vocabulary>male actor</vocabulary>.

Just a word of warning: over the years this word has taken on the connotation of "adult film actor" so most people would use <ja>俳優</ja> for "actor" now. You'll be learning that word very soon!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
